text:
I wish to use the cloak and declock functions of microsoft vss. Currently 
http://ant.apache.org/manual/OptionalTasks/vss.html provides some basic 
functions and are extremely useful. But adding cloak would make the ant 
scripting a lot easier.

Also, this is first time I am writing to an open source team. I would not mind 
writing these myself but I don't know where to start and how would the Ant 
Apache organization recognize my code and if they will put it with their next 
release.

Please contact me by email address vshekhar@gmail.com

Thank you
Vinayak
creator: vshekhar@gmail.com
mbenson@apache.org
text:
you'd probably be best served by coding this functionality yourself and making 
it available yourself.  the ongoing problem with the SCM libraries is that, 
for most products, we lack testers in the Ant developer camp, which reduces 
our confidence in any changes we might release affecting those libraries.  If 
you extend or rewrite the tasks yourself you can then link to them on the Ant 
wiki.

creator: kevin.jackson@it.fts-vn.com
text: these are now available as part of the vss antlib
